title: The Gunk
description:
The Gunk stars Rani, part of our duo of gritty space haulers , struggling to make a buck as they chance upon an untouched planet brimming with life. They came in search of valuable resources, and it looks like theyâ€™ve hit the jackpot As they uncover the dormant secrets of a shattered civilization , they must battle the curse of a toxic gunk parasite, all while getting caught in a spiral of festering mistrust.
Use your trusty Power Glove to reverse the corruption , uncover secrets of old and heal the planet! Experience the evolving relationship of the crew, as you explore this unique planet. Use your ingenuity as well as your quick reactions to overcome the challenges that await. What stories lay hidden in this mysterious abandoned world? What does it all mean? What role can Rani play in the fate of this evocative, moody planet? Sometimes you just have to take a leap of faith. Bugsnax
